name: Dearch
description: Here is my personnal project i'm working on, It's a puzzle/platformer where you'll need to die by using your environnment, which will transport you to a new dimension where some objects are activated or deactivated (and more). I'm still trying to find some more ideas to implement in the game to make it more durable and enjoyable and the music is not final. Remember that this is just a prototype/short demo so expect less than 5 min of playtime ;)
